entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or wet flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or wet flurries changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
